text: Drew Barrymore today launches a contemporary lifestyle brand called Dear Drew on Amazon Fashion. Described as “ a love letter to women around the world, ” the collection includes apparel, handbags, jewelry, luggage, hair tools, lingerie and loungewear, priced from $ 28 to $ 248. In the first campaign image, Barrymore wears the Mulberry Street tie - front skirt, SoHo fan drop earrings, Little Italy identification bracelet, NoLIta cuff and You are Strong clutch.
